EmailTemplate.description: cloned from 013 December 2018 get webinar reminder
EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_GET Partner Newsletter_2018.016 January 2019 GET Webinar Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Global Ecosystem November Webinar: Co-Marketing With Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We are excited to welcome Kamala Dasika and Jeff Kelly to the January Global Ecosystem webinar. Kamala and Jeff come from our marketing team and will deliver a partner-centric look at building your brand with Pivotal, including:
- An overview of Pivotal's "We Partner Differently" approach to partner marketing
- Pivotal's key marketing and messaging themes for 2019
- Best practices for effectively marketing your relationship with Pivotal - Feedback session to answer any questions
Looking forward to seeing you there!
Date: Wednesday, January 23, 2018 Time: 2PM EST / 11AM PST
Thank you, The Pivotal Global Ecosystem Team Register here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/webinars-events.aspx]]>
